full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN RNAM GSUM LA GSOL MCHOD 'BUL TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(CES DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA RNAM GSUM GYI GSOL MCHOD RGYUN GYI KHA 'DON DU BYAS TSUL 'PHRIN LAS BZHI'I LHUN SGRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, GUNG THANG 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS RJE BTZUN DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME'I GSUNGS DANG, ,MKHAN PO NO MON HAN GYI GSUNGS LA GZHIR BYA BAS WA G'INDRA MING CAN BSGRIGS PA YI GE PA NI BADZRA ZHES BYA BA'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,) SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,
